Fix critical bugs: auth, RBAC, Firebase config, null safety

- Remove duplicate Firebase initialization \(firebase.ts\)
- Fix Dashboard hardcoded isAdmin/isReviewer to use actual user roles
- Fix ProtectedRoute incomplete pending/rejected status handling
- Fix Dashboard wrong redirect path \(/login -> /auth/login\)

- Fix ai-config-store hardcoded ''system'' updatedBy to use actual user ID
- Fix auth-store missing error handling for profile fetch failures
- Fix non-null assertions \(user!.unitId\) with proper null checks
- Remove unused imports \(GoogleAuthProvider, signInWithPopup\)
- Add missing dependency @radix-ui/react-accordion

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
